formula.description:
The formula for the chemical component. Formulae are written
 according to the following rules:

 (1) Only recognized element symbols may be used.

 (2) Each element symbol is followed by a 'count' number. A count
    of '1' may be omitted.

 (3) A space or parenthesis must separate each cluster of
    (element symbol + count), but in general parentheses are
    not used.

 (4) The order of elements depends on whether carbon is
    present or not. If carbon is present, the order should be:
    C, then H, then the other elements in alphabetical order
    of their symbol. If carbon is not present, the elements
    are listed purely in alphabetic order of their symbol. This
    is the 'Hill' system used by Chemical Abstracts.

formula_weight.description: Formula mass in daltons of the chemical component.

id.description:
The value of _chem_comp.id must uniquely identify each item in
 the CHEM_COMP list.

 For protein polymer entities, this is the three-letter code for
 the amino acid.

 For nucleic acid polymer entities, this is the one-letter code
 for the base.

name.description: The full name of the component.

pdbx_ambiguous_flag.description:
A preliminary classification used by PDB to indicate
 that the chemistry of this component while described
 as clearly as possible is still ambiguous.  Software
 tools may not be able to process this component
 definition.

pdbx_formal_charge.description:
The net integer charge assigned to this component. This is the
 formal charge assignment normally found in chemical diagrams.

pdbx_initial_date.description: Date component was added to database.

pdbx_release_status.description: This data item holds the current release status for the component.

type.description:
For standard polymer components, the type of the monomer.
 Note that monomers that will form polymers are of three types:
 linking monomers, monomers with some type of N-terminal (or 5')
 cap and monomers with some type of C-terminal (or 3') cap.

alt_atom_id.description:
An alternative identifier for the atom. This data item would be
 used in cases where alternative nomenclatures exist for labelling
 atoms in a group.

atom_id.description:
The value of _chem_comp_atom.atom_id must uniquely identify
 each atom in each monomer in the CHEM_COMP_ATOM list.

 The atom identifiers need not be unique over all atoms in the
 data block; they need only be unique for each atom in a
 component.

 Note that this item need not be a number; it can be any unique
 identifier.

charge.description:
The net integer charge assigned to this atom. This is the
 formal charge assignment normally found in chemical diagrams.

comp_id.description:
This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp.id in the CHEM_COMP
 category.

model_Cartn_x.description:
The x component of the coordinates for this atom in this
 component specified as orthogonal angstroms. The choice of
 reference axis frame for the coordinates is arbitrary.

 The set of coordinates input for the entity here is intended to
 correspond to the atomic model used to generate restraints for
 structure refinement, not to atom sites in the ATOM_SITE
 list.

model_Cartn_y.description:
The y component of the coordinates for this atom in this
 component specified as orthogonal angstroms. The choice of
 reference axis frame for the coordinates is arbitrary.

 The set of coordinates input for the entity here is intended to
 correspond to the atomic model used to generate restraints for
 structure refinement, not to atom sites in the ATOM_SITE
 list.

model_Cartn_z.description:
The z component of the coordinates for this atom in this
 component specified as orthogonal angstroms. The choice of
 reference axis frame for the coordinates is arbitrary.

 The set of coordinates input for the entity here is intended to
 correspond to the atomic model used to generate restraints for
 structure refinement, not to atom sites in the ATOM_SITE
 list.

pdbx_align.description: Atom name alignment offset in PDB atom field.

pdbx_aromatic_flag.description: A flag indicating an aromatic atom.

pdbx_component_atom_id.description:
The atom identifier in the subcomponent where a
 larger component has been divided subcomponents.

pdbx_component_comp_id.description:
The component identifier for the subcomponent where a
 larger component has been divided subcomponents.

pdbx_leaving_atom_flag.description: A flag indicating a leaving atom.

pdbx_model_Cartn_x_ideal.description:
An alternative x component of the coordinates for this atom in this
 component specified as orthogonal angstroms.

pdbx_model_Cartn_y_ideal.description:
An alternative y component of the coordinates for this atom in this
 component specified as orthogonal angstroms.

pdbx_model_Cartn_z_ideal.description:
An alternative z component of the coordinates for this atom in this
 component specified as orthogonal angstroms.

pdbx_ordinal.description: Ordinal index for the component atom list.

pdbx_polymer_type.description: Is the atom in a polymer or non-polymer subcomponent in the BIRD definition.

pdbx_residue_numbering.description: Preferred residue numbering in the BIRD definition.

pdbx_stereo_config.description: The chiral configuration of the atom that is a chiral center.

type_symbol.description:
The code used to identify the atom species representing
 this atom type. Normally this code is the element
 symbol.

atom_id_1.description:
The ID of the first of the two atoms that define the bond.

 This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp_atom.atom_id in the
 CHEM_COMP_ATOM category.

atom_id_2.description:
The ID of the second of the two atoms that define the bond.

 This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp_atom.atom_id in the
 CHEM_COMP_ATOM category.

comp_id.description:
This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp.id in the CHEM_COMP
 category.

pdbx_aromatic_flag.description: A flag indicating an aromatic bond.

pdbx_ordinal.description: Ordinal index for the component bond list.

pdbx_stereo_config.description: Stereochemical configuration across a double bond.

value_order.description:
The value that should be taken as the target for the chemical
 bond associated with the specified atoms, expressed as a bond
 order.

action_type.description: The action associated with this audit record.

comp_id.description:
This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp.id in the CHEM_COMP
 category.

date.description: The date associated with this audit record.

ordinal.description:
This data item is an ordinal index for the
 PDBX_CHEM_COMP_AUDIT category.

comp_id.description:
This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp.id in the CHEM_COMP
 category.

descriptor.description:
This data item contains the descriptor value for this
 component.

program.description:
This data item contains the name of the program
 or library used to compute the descriptor.

program_version.description:
This data item contains the version of the program
 or library used to compute the descriptor.

type.description: This data item contains the descriptor type.

comp_id.description:
This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp.id in the CHEM_COMP
 category.

identifier.description:
This data item contains the identifier value for this
 component.

program.description:
This data item contains the name of the program
 or library used to compute the identifier.

program_version.description:
This data item contains the version of the program
 or library used to compute the identifier.

type.description: This data item contains the identifier type.

datablock_name.description: Source data block containing the loaded data set

locator.description: Locator of file containing loaded data

title: Schema for content type bird_chem_comp collection bird_chem_comp_v5_0_2
